title: Peter Ekström
text: Peter Ekström is a <a href="Sweden">Swedish</a> <a href="Canoe%20racing">sprint canoer</a> who competed in the mid-1980s. He won a silver medal in the K-4 10000 m event at the <a href="1985%20ICF%20Canoe%20Sprint%20World%20Championships">1985 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships</a> in <a href="Mechelen">Mechelen</a>.
